posts.title: Asian Fresh Supermarket Opens in Lowell
posts.content:
Asian Fresh Supermarket opened this month at 203 N Bloomington St in Lowell bringing a large-scale, Asian grocery store right to the center of NWA.

  • They have it all: Asian Fresh carries everything from fresh meat, vegetables, fruit, housewares, and specialty items.
  • Happy you’re here: Customers are already sharing positive feedback about the store’s organization, inventory, customer service, and an overall excitement about NWA’s new Asian food market. 

Visit Asian Fresh Supermarket online HERE.

posts.title: Enter The Creative Process At The Amazeum’s New Exhibit
posts.content:
The Scott Family Amazeum opened a brand new exhibit last Saturday called "In the Making: Ideas Come to Life."

  • The process: The interactive exhibit will highlight the creative process, engaging the audience in how makers conceive, design, and build new exhibitions. 
  • While it lasts: The new exhibit will be around until May 2023, though it will change periodically bringing new ideas from the creative team to the public. 

Plan your visit to the Amazeum HERE.

posts.title: Camp In Style With Ozark Luxury Camping
posts.content:
Turn your next camping experience into a glamping experience with Ozark Luxury Camping’s unique tent service. 

  • At your service: Services range from full party planning, to movie nights, to hosting luxury picnics. Whatever your event, they’ve got you covered. 
  • Camp out or in: Ozark Luxury Camping will help you throw an amazing party whether you’re planning a fall camping party in the backyard or a personalized holiday sleepover. 

Follow Ozark Luxury Camping on Instagram HERE.

posts.title: Join The Walking Dead This Weekend In Eureka Springs
posts.content:
Eureka Springs will be crawling with the walking dead during the Eureka Springs Zombie Crawl parade on Saturday, Oct 29 at 6p. 

  • A need to feed: The parade will include street performers, scary floats, and post-apocalyptic themed vehicles. The entry fee to join the parade is two cans of food to benefit the local food bank. 
  • Night walkers: Stranger Springs, the official after party of the Zombie Crawl for those 21+, will take place at the Best Western Convention Center from 8p-midnight featuring costume contests, 80’s synth wave, and more! 

Learn more and join the Eureka Springs Zombie Crawl HERE.

posts.title: Mercy Northwest Earns Five-Star Rating
posts.content:
Mercy Hospital Northwest in Rogers has received a five-star rating by the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services for the third year in a row. 

  • One of a kind: Mercy was the highest ranked hospital in NWA, and was one of only two Arkansas hospitals to receive a five-star rating. 
  • Excellence: Receiving a five-star rating by the CMS is one of the strongest indicators that patients will receive excellent care. 

Read the full story HERE.

pick.title: NWA Daily Picks
pick.content:
• Prepare your tastebuds: Top Chef NWA is Friday, Oct 28, pitting first-class chefs against each other for an incredible dining experience. Get your tickets HERE.* 
  • Are you watching closely?: Touring-illusionist Reza is bringing his big-tech stage production to the Jones Center on Sunday, Nov 6. Get your tickets HERE.* 
  • The apprentice: The Stable is looking to recruit someone who didn’t go to college for an executive apprenticeship in their No College? No Worries initiative. 
  • Gone but not forgotten: Stone Mill Bread and Flour Co has closed its Fayetteville location “until further notice,” and James Blunt music downloads are at an all time high. 
  • I want that: Trigger your real estate envy with this list of the most expensive homes for sale in NWA. 
  • Let's talk: Interested in advertising in the newsletter? Check out our deals HERE.
